debuff.condition: When being hit with a debuff skill OR by using specified debuff skill listed below

additional_info: [Debuff #1] can't re-activate when [Buff #2] is still active
While the effect is active, the same buff effect from another piece of equipment cannot be activated
The HP increase from certain gear (e.g., HP Up Core or Rare Rune [1H Sword]) will not be considered as an HP decrease
Some debuff may not activated. (e.g., attack skills that can inflict debuff along with damage to the target, debuffs that have probability of activating due to equipments, etc.)

List of player skills that can trigger [Debuff #1] : [Saint: Discourage] [Shaman: Moonless Dawn] [Shaman: Weeping Soul] [Sorcerer: Undulation] [Receptor: Daunting Pose] *thanks to @lotus from Super Spammer Discord for the info and testing

list: Increase Damage Upper Limit by 1500 times of Base Earth ATK for 300 seconds (max: 3,000,000)
buff.condition: 100% chance to activate when you attack

data.name: Hidden Blade Earrings

buff.name: 2H Sword Passive
buff.condition: Effective immediately while equipping 2H Sword in the main gear slot

buff.name: 2H Sword on Battle Start
list: Increase ATK by 1,000% of equipped 2H Sword Base ATK (including Sub Gear) (max: 500,000)
Increase Damage Upper Limit by 10,000% of equipped 2H Sword Base ATK (including Sub Gear) (max: 20,000,000)
Reduce Fire / Wind / Earth / Water / Divine / Spirit Physical Damage Taken by 200% of equipped 2H Sword Base MATK (Main Gear only)
buff.condition: 100% chance to activate at the start of the battle while equipping a 2H Sword in the main gear slot

buff.name: Dagger Passive
list: DEF +300 for each Dagger equipped (including Sub Gear)
MDEF +300 for each Dagger equipped (including Sub Gear)
(Debuff) Max HP -1,000 for each Dagger equipped (including Sub Gear)
buff.condition: Effective immediately while equipping Dagger in the main gear slot

buff.name: Dagger on Debuff Skill
list: Single Enemy Damage Taken increase by 10%
buff.condition: 20% chance to activate when using a debuff skill

buff.name: Dagger on Battle Start
list: Extra Damage +200,000 for each equipped Dagger (including Sub Gear)
Increase Damage Upper Limit by 10,000% of equipped Dagger Base MATK (including Sub Gear) (max: 10,000,000)
buff.condition: 100% chance to activate at the start of the battle while equipping a Dagger in the main gear slot

additional_info: While the effect is active, the same buff effect from another piece of equipment cannot be activated
The effect will NOT trigger for Dual Wield

data.name: Harmony Earrings

buff.name: Passive
list: Increase ATK by 1,000% of your current HP (max: 100,000)
Incresae MATK by 1,000% of your current HP (max: 100,000)

buff.name: Offensive
list: Increase ATK by 1,000% of your current HP (max: 500,000)
Increase MATK by 1,000% of your current HP (max: 500,000)
buff.condition: 100% chance to activate when you attack (remove [Buff: Defensive] when triggered)

buff.name: Defensive
list: Reduce Fire / Wind / Earth / Water / Divine / Spirit Physical Damage Taken by 200% of your Base DEF
buff.condition: 100% chance to activate when you get hit (remove [Buff: Offensive] when triggered)

data.additional_info: While the effect is active, the same buff effect from another piece of equipment cannot be activated

buff.name: Skill Use
buff.condition: Each time you use a skill
